title: Unique Kent Nature Reserve Treehouse with Safari Experience & Animal Park Entry
description: Experience the height of luxury with a one-of-a-kind stay in a treehouse, nestled in the canopy of England's Port Lympne Reserve. Surrounded by lush natural landscapes and a wild safari park, you'll have full access to explore both with the use of a golf buggy. These extraordinary luxury treehouses offer the best of both worlds, sitting within metres of majestic animals and offering panoramic views over the Romney Marsh countryside and Kent coastline, while being less than an hour from London. Indulge in fresh and seasonal ingredients at The Garden Room, savour authentic Italian cuisine at Babydoll's or enjoy a wine or hot chocolate by the cosy log fire at the Mansion Bar & Terrace before embarking on a wild safari experience - an unforgettable journey awaits.
offer_address: Aldington Road, Lympne, Hythe, Kent, CT21 4PD, United Kingdom
